message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'd really like. I'm asking for $200 for it. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $175. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
Thanks for the offer, Bob.  I value this product highly. How about we meet halfway between our offers at $187.5?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I was thinking more along the lines of $180. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
